statements: SELECT * FROM customer_notifications;
SELECT customer_id, notification_type FROM customer_notifications WHERE notification_timestamp > NOW();
SELECT order_id, notification_message FROM customer_notifications WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, notification_type FROM customer_notifications ORDER BY notification_type ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, notification_timestamp FROM customer_notifications;
SELECT * FROM customer_notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_timestamp FROM customer_notifications WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT notification_message FROM customer_notifications WHERE order_id > 5000 AND notification_type = 'Promotion';
SELECT * FROM customer_notifications WHERE notification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND notification_timestamp <= '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_status FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_id, order_status, customer_id FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN notifications ON orders.order_id = notifications.order_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_id DESC;

SELECT notifications.message, orders.order_status FROM notifications JOIN orders ON notifications.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 200 AND notifications.sent_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT orders.order_id, COUNT(notifications.notification_id) AS num_notifications FROM orders LEFT JOIN notifications ON orders.order_id = notifications.order_id GROUP BY orders.order_id HAVING num_notifications > 1;

SELECT DISTINCT orders.customer_id, orders.order_status, notifications.message FROM orders JOIN notifications ON orders.order_id = notifications.order_id ORDER BY orders.customer_id ASC, notifications.sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT notification_content, notification_date FROM Notifications WHERE customer_id = 2 AND notification_type = 'SPECIAL';
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'SHIPPED';
SELECT * FROM Notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC, notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_content FROM Notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders;
SELECT update_message, update_date FROM order_updates;
SELECT notification_message, notification_date, customer_id FROM notifications;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status='Delivered';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT order_id, update_date, update_message FROM order_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, notification_date, notification_message FROM customers INNER JOIN notifications ON customers.customer_id = notifications.customer_id WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT customer_id, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM order_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, notification_message, notification_date FROM customers JOIN notifications ON customers.customer_id = notifications.customer_id;
